mapper.select: select userid ,pwd,name,gender,birth,is_lunar,cphone,email,habit,regdate from member where userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(USERID, PWD, NAME, GENDER, BIRTH, IS_LUNAR, CPHONE, EMAIL, HABIT, REGDATE) VALUES( #{userid},#{pwd},#{name},'ë‚¨','2023','1','2','3','4',SYSDATE)
